source.//include?: An array of paths to include in the documentation.
source.//exclude?: An array of paths to exclude from the documentation

//plugins: An array of JSDoc plugins to use.

opts.//destination?: The directory where JSDoc should write the documentation.
opts.//recurse?: Whether JSDoc should recurse into subdirectories.
opts.//encoding?: The encoding to use when reading and writing files.
opts.//verbose?: Whether JSDoc should log verbose output.
opts.//private?: Whether JSDoc should include symbols marked as @privat.
opts.//readme?: The file to use as the project's README..
opts.//template?: The name of the JSDoc template to use. example: node_modules/minami

theme_opts.//base_url: To set the base url, Make sure to add a forward slash (/) at the end of the URL.
